test-case.name: fn-starts-with2args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "starts-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:starts-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-starts-with2args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "starts-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(mid range) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:starts-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-starts-with2args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "starts-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:starts-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-starts-with2args-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "starts-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(mid range)
test-case.test: fn:starts-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-starts-with2args-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "starts-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(upper bound)
test-case.test: fn:starts-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with()`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with(())`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with("foo", "foo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint")`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with("foo", "foo")`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with("tattoo", "tat")`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(starts-with("tattoo", "att"))`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with((), ())`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `starts-with("a string", ())`.

test-case.name: K-StartsWithFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(starts-with("", "a string"))`.

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-1
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-2
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-3
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-4
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-5
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-StartsWithFunc-6
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.description: test fn:starts-with with collation and empty string
